resp = client.indices.create(
    index="shapes",
    mappings={
        "properties": {
            "geometry": {
                "type": "shape"
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)

resp1 = client.index(
    index="shapes",
    id="footprint",
    document={
        "geometry": {
            "type": "envelope",
            "coordinates": [
                [
                    1355,
                    5355
                ],
                [
                    1400,
                    5200
                ]
            ]
        }
    },
)
print(resp1)

resp2 = client.search(
    index="example",
    query={
        "shape": {
            "geometry": {
                "indexed_shape": {
                    "index": "shapes",
                    "id": "footprint",
                    "path": "geometry"
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp2)
